-h|--help: --- show this help message and exit
--args: --- Specify the executable file you wish to debug and any arguments to pass to it.
-g GDB_CMD|--gdb-cmd: --- gdb binary and arguments to run.
-p|--port: --- The port on which gdbgui will be hosted
--host: --- The host ip address on which gdbgui serve
-r|--remote: --- Shortcut to set host to 0.0.0.0 and suppress browser from opening.
--auth-file: --- Require authentication before accessing gdbgui in the browser.
--remap-sources|-m: --- Replace compile-time source paths to local source paths.
-n|--no-browser: --- By default, the browser will open with gdbgui.
-b|--browser: --- Use the given browser executable instead of the system default.
--debug: --- The debug flag of this Flask application.
